document.full_text: u.s. stocks ended a volatile trading day mostly flat on thursday as investors were reluctant to make bets a day before a critical labor market report that could magnify fears the economy is slowing.
document.title: wall street ends flat after volatile day; jobs ahead
lines_and_colors: u.s. stocks ended a volatile trading day mostly flat on thursday as investors were reluctant to make bets a day before a critical labor market report that could magnify fears the economy is slowing.
